data.message:
Marshall, 
Happy New Year. I wish you more hit songs and albums and only the best for the best rapper. I'm your big fan, from Serbia, and i want to meet you. Every day I wake up with your voice on alarm and go to bed with the voice of the best rapper(you). Grettings for you and Hailie.I'm sorry for your b-day because I don't send you a message.
p.s. I'm apologise about my english :-D
#stanforever
#loseyourself
